A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A big let down. More a parody than actual star wars. Story arcs of new characters were not as well thought out as antisipated. Key reveals\, back stories and origins are left untold or not to the fullest. Too much bad humor or wrongly timed. The order and the resistence both prove themselves to be incompetent. Luke stands out but ultimately dissapoints. Nothing to look forward to in the third installment.
